description: Identifying Potential Areas for Urban Agriculture in Milan, Italy CERTIFICATE OF ACHIEVEMENT This certificate is presented to Soham Das Junior ML Engineer Project Impact: Completed in 8 weeks, the project successfully developed three web applications to identify potential areas for urban farming in Milan, Italy, using remote sensing and GIS for optimal site selection and data-driven cultivation insights. Omdena has confirmed the participation of this individual in the program. Confirm program completion at confirm.omdena.com/LCuhfp2
